text: Perlo may refer to: ==Places== *Perlo, Piedmont, a comune in the Province of Cuneo, Italy * Perlő, the Hungarian name for Brebu Commune, Caraş-Severin County, Romania ==People== *Phil Perlo, American football player *Victor Perlo, an American economist ==Other uses== *Perlo group, an American network of Soviet espionage agents
title: Perlo
